wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Kisthu archìbiu ha la licèntzia [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported].
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Si bói turrà a miscià lu materiari, oppuru si bói traiffuimmallu o pigliallu cumenti basi (pa 'na noba criazioni), debi disthribuì li cuntributi tói cu' [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses la matessi licènzia di l'originari ossia cunduna licènzia cumpatìbiri].
